summary.span: 表示一个从托管 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的服务器请求的 .aspx 文件（也称为 Web 窗体页）。

span.span: Represents an .aspx file, also known as a Web Forms page, requested from a server that hosts an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是与.aspx 扩展名的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have an .aspx extension. 这些文件在运行时作为编译对象，并在服务器内存中缓存。These files are compiled at run time as objects and cached in server memory. 如果你想要创建使用代码隐藏技术的 Web 窗体页，从此类派生。If you want to create a Web Forms page using the code-behind technique, derive from this class. 快速应用程序开发 (RAD) 设计器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 会自动使用此模型创建 Web 窗体页。Rapid application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, automatically use this model to create Web Forms pages. 对象用作页上，除了实现中的所有服务器控件的命名容器接口或是实现此接口的控件的子控件。The object serves as the naming container for all server controls in a page, except those that implement the interface or are child controls of controls that implement this interface. 类是可作为 Web 应用程序，用户界面，这种情况下，应进行审查以确保最佳实践编写安全代码和保护应用程序所遵循的控件。The class is a control that acts as the user interface for your Web application, and as such should be scrutinized to make sure best practices for writing secure code and securing applications are followed. 有关这些主题的常规信息，请参阅[概述的 Web 应用程序安全威胁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)， [NIB： 安全策略最佳实践](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05)，并[重要安全性概念](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md)。For general information on these topics, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a), [NIB: Security Policy Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d49bc4d5-efb7-4caa-a2fe-e4d3cec63c05), and [Key Security Concepts](~/docs/standard/security/key-security-concepts.md). 有关更具体的信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 显示安全错误消息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa)，[如何： 保护对脚本侵入应用 html Web 应用程序中编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，并[验证控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more specific information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Display Safe Error Messages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f70ac33-6e11-4e98-ab7d-bae9c0e7eefa), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## Examples Visual Studio Web 站点项目的源代码是可随附于本主题：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192425). 下面的代码示例演示如何将在代码隐藏页模型中使用类。The following code example demonstrates how the class is used in the code-behind page model. 请注意，代码隐藏源文件声明继承自基本页类的分部类。Note that the code-behind source file declares a partial class that inherits from a base page class. 基本页类可以是，也可以是另一个类派生自。The base page class can be , or it can be another class that derives from . 此外，请注意，分部类允许要使用而无需页面上定义的控件定义为字段成员的代码隐藏文件。Furthermore, note that the partial class allows the code-behind file to use controls defined on the page without the need to define them as field members. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/cs/pageexample.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page_Overview/vb/pageexample.aspx.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例显示了对应于前面的代码隐藏源文件的.aspx 文件。The following code example shows the .aspx file that corresponds to the preceding code-behind source file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 为异步页注册不需要状态信息的开始和结束事件处理程序委托。

span.span: Registers beginning and ending event handler delegates that do not require state information for an asynchronous page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将处理程序添加到异步网页。Use the method to add handlers to an asynchronous Web page. 您可以注册多个异步处理程序;但是，只有一个处理程序运行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果你想要同时处理多个异步方法，则应使用单个方法并启动多个异步操作从该处理程序。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 异步处理程序的调用之间和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，所有事件 (通过事件) 运行，并且每个注册调用方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 该处理程序完成后，相应调用方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多个异步处理程序，则调用下一个处理程序。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 调用已注册的异步事件处理程序之后，称为页面事件的其余部分，从事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用异步请求显示在本地 Web 服务器的默认页的 HTML 源代码控件。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/CS/pageaddonprerendercompleteasynccs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PageAddOnPreRenderCompleteAsync/VB/pageaddonprerendercompleteasyncvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来添加处理程序需要到异步 Web 页的状态信息。Use the method to add handlers that require state information to an asynchronous Web page. 传入的对象`state`参数可以是任何应用程序要求中指定的事件处理程序委托之间传输信息的对象`beginHandler`和`endHandler`参数。The object passed in the `state` parameter can be any object that your application requires to transfer information between event handler delegates specified in the `beginHandler` and the `endHandler` parameters. 您可以注册多个异步处理程序;但是，只有一个处理程序运行一次。You can register multiple asynchronous handlers; however, only one handler runs at a time. 如果你想要同时处理多个异步方法，则应使用单个方法并启动多个异步操作从该处理程序。If you want to process multiple asynchronous methods simultaneously, you should use a single method and launch multiple asynchronous operations from that handler. 异步处理程序的调用之间和事件。The asynchronous handlers are called between the and events. 首先，所有事件 (通过事件) 运行，并且每个注册调用方法。First, all events (through the event) are run, and then each registered method is called. 该处理程序完成后，相应调用方法。When the handler completes, the corresponding method is called. 如果有多个异步处理程序，则调用下一个处理程序。If there are multiple asynchronous handlers, the next handler is called. 调用已注册的异步事件处理程序之后，称为页面事件的其余部分，从事件。After the registered asynchronous event handlers have been called, the rest of the page events are called, beginning with the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用异步请求显示在本地 Web 服务器的默认页的 HTML 源代码控件。The following code example uses an asynchronous request to display the HTML source code of the local Web server's default page in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`true`，此属性允许页后，可以在单线程单元 (STA) 线程上执行。When set to `true`, this property allows the page to be executed on a single-threaded apartment (STA) thread. 这允许页后，可以调用 STA 组件，如使用 Visual Basic 6.0 开发的组件。This allows the page to call STA components, such as components developed with Visual Basic 6.0. 此属性设置为`true`还允许页后，可以调用需要访问非托管 ASP 内置对象的 COM + 组件。Setting this property to `true` also allows the page to call COM+ components that require access to the unmanaged ASP built-in objects. 这些是可通过 ASP`ObjectContext`对象或`OnStartPage`方法。These are accessible through the ASP `ObjectContext` object or the `OnStartPage` method. 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 设置`aspcompat`属性为`true`.aspx 文件中使用的指令。Set the `aspcompat` attribute to `true` using the directive in the .aspx file. 当请求页面时，动态生成的类来设置属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指示处理异步任务时使用的超时间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time-out interval used when processing asynchronous tasks.

value.span: 一个 ，包含完成异步任务所允许的时间间隔。

span.span: A that contains the allowed time interval for completion of the asynchronous task.

value.span: 默认时间间隔为 45 秒。

span.span: The default time interval is 45 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页的异步超时值表示页面将等待执行异步任务的时间量。The asynchronous time-out of the page represents the amount of time that the page will wait to perform asynchronous tasks. 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 设置页面异步超时间隔使用的 Web 配置文件或在指令中。Set the page asynchronous time-out interval using the of the Web configuration file or in the directive. 页指令设置页配置部分中的值会重写。Values set in the page configuration section are overwritten by the page directive. 定义在异步任务使用类，并注册一个开始、 结束和超时处理程序。Define your asynchronous task using the class and register a beginning, an ending, and a time-out handler. 如果指定的时间间隔内未完成的异步任务，将调用的超时处理程序。If the asynchronous task does not complete in the time interval specified, the time-out handler will be invoked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意，开始、 结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在示例中，人为延迟引入以演示超出分配的时间内的形式中指定的任务的异步任务的这种情况属性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，一个异步任务无法用于执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，和超时处理程序提供妥善降级，如果在指定的时间内未执行该任务。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. 请注意，在 page 指令中设置属性。Note that the property is set in the page directive. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的对象可以存储和检索在后续请求中的任意数据。An application's object allows you to store and retrieve arbitrary data on subsequent requests. 缓存不专门与页面或用户会话相关联。The cache is not specifically associated with a page or user session. 它主要用于增强应用程序的性能。It is used primarily to enhance application performance. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存应用程序数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d)。For more information, see [Caching Application Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/206f977d-7860-4d20-bdd5-c3b3d8479f3d). 应用程序缓存和页面输出缓存之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 缓存概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)。For more information on the difference between application caching and page output caching, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将插入到两个整数的总和对象使用属性。The following code example inserts the sum of two integers into the object using the property. 然后检索值使用方法并将其写入Web 服务器控件。It then retrieves the value using the method and writes it to a Web server control. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值使您得以重写对浏览器功能的自动检测，并指定针对特定的浏览器客户端页的呈现方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that allows you to override automatic detection of browser capabilities and to specify how a page is rendered for particular browser clients.

value.span: ，指定要重写的浏览器功能。

span.span: A that specifies the browser capabilities that you want to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未设置属性，与关联的对象属性反映客户端浏览器的功能。If you do not set the property, the object associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. 如果设置此属性，则禁用客户端浏览器检测和页面将使用与你提供的值 （别名） 关联的浏览器功能。If you do set this property, client browser detection is disabled and the page will use browser capabilities associated with the value (alias) that you provide. Web 服务器计算机上的根 Web.config 配置文件定义以下默认别名，你可以使用常见用户代理字符串作为简写形式：The root Web.config configuration file on the Web server computer defines the following default aliases that you can use as shorthand for common user-agent strings: - `uplevel`它指定浏览器功能等效于 Internet Explorer 6.0。`uplevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to Internet Explorer 6.0. - `downlevel`它指定浏览器功能等效于较旧的浏览器不支持客户端脚本。`downlevel`, which specifies browser capabilities equivalent to older browsers that do not support client script. 此别名可用于确定网页在浏览器中已禁用的客户端脚本的工作原理。You can use this alias to determine how Web pages would work in a browser that has client script disabled. 您可以设置以编程方式使用此属性的别名，也可以设置它以声明方式使用`ClientTarget`指令的特性。You can set the alias programmatically using this property, or you can set it declaratively using the `ClientTarget` attribute of the directive. 您可以定义中的其他别名`clientTarget`部分中的应用程序级别的 Web.config 文件。You can define additional aliases in the `clientTarget` section of the application-level Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[clientTarget 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922)。For more information, see [clientTarget Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/17a0fa6e-a065-49cc-b900-ef73eda6a922). ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义`ie302`别名并包括在其 Web.config 文件中配置你的应用程序所需的部分。The following code example defines an `ie302` alias and includes sections needed to configure your application in its Web.config file. 使用此别名，可以设置属性设置为`ie302`和自定义网页专门针对 Internet Explorer 3.02 浏览器。Using this alias, you can set the property to `ie302` and customize pages specifically for Internet Explorer 3.02 browsers. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，ASP.NET 验证控件事件源自已由该控件呈现用户界面。When the property is set to `true`, ASP.NET validates that a control event originated from the user interface that was rendered by that control. 控件在呈现期间注册其事件，然后在回发或回调处理过程中验证事件。A control registers its events during rendering and then validates the events during postback or callback handling. 例如，如果列表控件包含编号 1、 2 或 3 时呈现页面，并指定选项编号 4 收到的回发请求的选项，ASP.NET 将引发异常。For example, if a list control includes options numbered 1, 2, or 3 when the page is rendered, and if a postback request is received specifying option number 4, ASP.NET raises an exception. 在 ASP.NET 中的所有事件驱动控件默认情况下都使用此功能。All event-driven controls in ASP.NET use this feature by default. 如果要编写在运行时更改客户端中的控件的客户端脚本，您可能必须使用方法，以避免出现 false 事件验证错误。If you write client script that changes a control in the client at run time, you might have to use the method in order to avoid false event validation errors. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此功能可以减少未经授权或恶意的回发请求和回调的风险。This feature reduces the risk of unauthorized or malicious postback requests and callbacks. 强烈建议您不要禁用事件验证。It is strongly recommended that you do not disable event validation. 您设置通过设置属性`enableEventValidation`指令的特性或`enableEventValidation`的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。You set the property by setting the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the element in the Web.config file. 如果在代码中设置此属性，则必须将其之前对页进行初始化。If you set this property in code, you must set it before the page is initialized.

exception.span: 属性是在初始化页后设置的。

span.span: The property was set after the page was initialized.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页请求结束时该页是否保持其视图状态以及它包含的任何服务器控件的视图状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page maintains its view state, and the view state of any server controls it contains, when the current page request ends.

value.span: 如果该页保持其视图状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the page maintains its view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关为什么你可能想要禁用视图状态的信息，请参阅。For information about why you might want to disable view state, see . 即使是`false`，页可能会包含 ASP.NET 用于检测在回发的隐藏的视图状态字段。Even if is `false`, the page might contain a hidden view state field that is used by ASP.NET to detect a postback. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为`false`加载页面时。The following code example sets the property to `false` when the page is loaded. 这将禁用视图状态对象，也就是说，保存既不页面的视图状态信息，也不包含页上的任何控件。This disables view state for the object, meaning that neither view-state information for the page nor any controls contained by the page are saved. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1/CS/page_enableviewstate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Page_EnableViewState_ReSubmit_1/VB/page_enableviewstate.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示从客户端回发页时，ASP.NET 是否应在页的视图状态下检查消息身份验证代码 (MAC)。

value.span: 如果应对视图状态进行 MAC 检查和编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the view state should be MAC checked and encoded; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态 MAC 是页面的视图状态保留到页发送到浏览器时的隐藏变量的加密的版本。A view-state MAC is an encrypted version of the hidden variable that a page's view state is persisted to when the page is sent to the browser. 当此属性设置为`true`，加密的视图状态会检查以验证它在客户端上未被篡改。When this property is set to `true`, the encrypted view state is checked to verify that it has not been tampered with on the client. 在代码中未设置此属性。Do not set this property in code. 设置`EnableViewStateMac`属性在.aspx 文件中使用的指令。Set the `EnableViewStateMac` attribute using the directive in the .aspx file. 当请求页面时，动态生成的类来设置属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此属性应永远不会设置为`false`生产网站，即使应用程序或页不使用视图状态中。This attribute should never be set to `false` in a production Web site, even if the application or page does not use view state. 视图状态 MAC 可帮助确保视图状态除了其他 ASP.NET 功能的安全性。The view state MAC helps ensure the security of other ASP.NET functions in addition to view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteRegisteredAsyncTasks() cil managed

summary.span: 开始执行异步任务。

span.span: Starts the execution of an asynchronous task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义异步任务使用类。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 任务定义，并向页中使用注册后方法，可以调用方法开始异步任务。After the task is defined, and is registered with the page using the method, the method can be invoked to begin the asynchronous task. 自动调用方法中页处理任何已注册的异步任务，如果它们存在时的点，调用的非异步页面。The method is automatically called at the point in the page processing when any registered asynchronous tasks, if they exist, are invoked for a non-asynchronous page. 此自动调用之前发生事件。This automatic call to occurs just before the event. 调用你想要不自动调用此方法有时调用的任务的方法。Call the method for tasks you want to be invoked at times other than the automatic call to this method. 请注意，将只能一次通过执行异步任务可能不止一次调用。Note, asynchronous tasks will be executed only once even though may be called more than once. 上的每个调用重置属性方法。The property is reset on every call to the method. 最后一个值之前调用方法将优先。The last value of the prior to invoking the method takes precedence. 如果异步任务采用多个，调用过程中发生的后续任务调用立即超时。If an asynchronous task takes more than the , subsequent tasks invoked during that call are timed out immediately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意，开始、 结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在示例中，人为延迟引入以演示超出分配的时间内的形式中指定的任务的异步任务的这种情况属性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，一个异步任务无法用于执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，和超时处理程序提供妥善降级，如果在指定的时间内未执行该任务。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/CS/page_asynctask.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Page.AsyncTimeout/vb/page_asynctask.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取对对象可用于设置页面的文档标头信息。The property gets a reference to an object that you can use to set document header information for the page. 可用于添加信息，例如样式表、 样式规则、 标题和元数据，`head`元素。The allows you to add information such as style sheets, style rules, a title, and metadata to the `head` element. > [!NOTE] > 添加样式使用的方法以编程方式不支持异步回发期间的接口。Adding styles programmatically using the methods of the interface during asynchronous postbacks is not supported. 当将 AJAX 功能添加到 Web 页时，异步回发更新页面区域内的而不更新整个页面。When you add AJAX capabilities to a Web page, asynchronous postbacks update regions of the page without updating the whole page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Microsoft Ajax 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb)。For more information, see [Microsoft Ajax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be84d9b3-b7cd-47d7-8494-be4abfaad9cb). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问控件并以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the control programmatically using the property. 一个`title`元素和`style`元素添加到`head`的页的元素。A `title` element and `style` element are added to the `head` element of the page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面的初始化阶段结束时调用事件。The event is called at the end of the page's initialization stage. 在页面的生命周期的此阶段，声明的所有页上的控件进行了初始化，但尚未填充页面的状态。At this stage of the page's life cycle, all declared controls on the page are initialized, but the page's state is not yet populated. 您可以访问服务器控件，但它们将不包含从用户返回的信息。You can access server controls, but they will not yet contain information returned from the user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了两种用于将控件从一页传输到另一种机制。ASP.NET provides two mechanisms for transferring control from one page to another. 可以使用方法处理传输之间页面，也可以通过将分配到的网页 URL 使跨页请求属性来实现的按钮控件接口。You can use the method to transfer processing between pages, or you can make a cross-page request by assigning a page URL to the property of a button control that implements the interface. 在任一情况下，页属性将包含一个对象，表示上一页或原始发件人。In either case, the page property will contain an object that represents the previous or originator page. 如果页 A 例如，发送至页 B，页 A属性 (可通过访问属性) 将是`true`和页 B属性名称都是页 aIf, for example, Page A posts to Page B, Page A's property (accessible through the property) will be `true` and Page B's property will have the name of Page A.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回发和回调之间的差异的说明，请参阅[实现客户端回调而不回发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For an explanation of the difference between postbacks and callbacks, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试的值属性以确定页第一次呈现还是响应回发加载页面。The following example shows how to test the value of the property when the page is loaded in order to determine whether the page is being rendered for the first time or is responding to a postback. 如果首次呈现该页，该代码调用方法。If the page is being rendered for the first time, the code calls the method. （未显示） 的页标记包含显示星号，如果没有条目进行所需的输入字段的控件。The page markup (not shown) contains controls that display asterisks if no entry is made for a required input field. 调用会导致立即页呈现时，而不是等待，直到用户单击提交按钮显示的星号。Calling causes the asterisks to be displayed immediately when the page is rendered, instead of waiting until the user clicks the Submit button. 在回发后您就不必调用，因为该方法调用的一部分生命周期。After a postback, you do not have to call , because that method is called as part of the life cycle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 为此属性以返回`true`，当前的验证组中的所有验证服务器控件必须成功通过都验证。For this property to return `true`, all validation server controls in the current validation group must validate successfully. 您应该检查此属性才具有名为方法或一组`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`中`OnServerClick`启动窗体处理的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件处理程序。You should check this property only after you have called the method, or set the `CausesValidation` property to `true` in the `OnServerClick` event handler for an ASP.NET server control that initiates form processing. 这些服务器控件包括， ， ， ， ，并类。These server controls include the , , , , , and classes. 如果强制验证的验证组使用方法，则指定的验证组中的所有验证控件必须成功通过验证以及。If you force validation of a validation group using the method, then all validation controls in the specified validation group must validate successfully as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性设置的条件语句。The following code example demonstrates using the property to set up a conditional statement. 如果属性返回`true`，则`Text`属性的`lblOutput`控件设置为"页面适用 ！"If the property returns `true`, the `Text` property of the `lblOutput` control is set to "Page is valid!" 否则，设置为"的某些必填字段为空。"Otherwise, it is set to "Some of the required fields are empty." remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行创建所需的初始化和设置步骤实例。The method performs the initialization and setup steps required to create a instance. 在页面的生命周期的此阶段，页面上声明的服务器控件初始化为其默认状态;但是，均不填充每个控件的视图状态。In this stage of the page's life cycle, declared server controls on the page are initialized to their default state; however, the view state of each control is not yet populated. 页上的控件不能访问在页上的其他服务器控件`Page_Init`阶段，而不考虑其他控件是否子或父控件。A control on the page cannot access other server controls on the page during the `Page_Init` phase, regardless of whether the other controls are child or parent controls. 要创建并可供访问，不保证具有其他服务器控件。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 方法之后调用方法之前方法。The method is called after the method and before the method. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTTP 请求和响应是本质上是无状态。HTTP requests and responses are inherently stateless. 若要保留状态之间的 HTTP 请求，ASP.NET 服务器页可以存储状态。To maintain state between HTTP requests, ASP.NET server pages can store state. 此状态下，名为视图状态，由页面和控件设置和使页和控件显示像它们是相同的用户所看到并与之交互页上为其最后一个往返行程的数据组成。This state, called view state, consists of page and control settings and data that make the page and controls appear as if they are the same ones that the user saw and interacted with on their last round trip to the page. 有几种机制来存储到同一页面的连续请求之间的视图状态。Several mechanisms exist to store view state between successive requests to the same page. 抽象类表示这些状态存储机制的基类。The abstract class represents the base class for these state storage mechanisms. 页面开发人员通常不需要使用属性。Page developers will typically not need to use the property. 属性主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的类。The property is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件，可检查的页请求，如是否正在加载页回发的响应中的条件。This event enables you to check conditions of the page request, such as whether the page is being loaded in response to a postback. 此外可以检查配置文件属性的值。You can also check the values of profile properties. 该事件，可设置页生命周期中更高版本使用的值。The event enables you to set values that are used later in the page life cycle. 您可以动态设置主页面或请求的页面的主题和创建动态控件。You can dynamically set a master page or a theme for the requested page, and create dynamic controls. 详细了解如何事件的适合 ASP.NET 生命周期，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information about how the event fits into the ASP.NET life cycle, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面生命周期的预呈现阶段完成时引发事件。The event is raised when the pre-render stage of the page life cycle is complete. 在页生命周期的此阶段，创建所有控件、 完成所需的任何分页，和页已准备好呈现到输出。At this stage of the page life cycle, all controls are created, any pagination required is completed, and the page is ready to render to the output. 这是引发页面的视图状态保存之前的最后一个事件。This is the last event raised before the page's view state is saved. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用方法或使用跨页面发送到另一个 ASP.NET 页面从传输处理，发送页中包含对于目标页可能是必需的请求信息。When you use the method or use cross-page posting to transfer processing from one ASP.NET page to another, the originating page contains request information that might be required for the destination page. 可以使用属性来访问该信息。You can use the property to access that information. 如果当前页呈现 （不是传输或从另一个页面的同时发布），直接请求的结果属性包含`null`。If the current page is being rendered as a result of a direct request (not a transfer or cross-post from another page), the property contains `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例是在两个部分。The following example is in two parts. 第一种是使用 ASP.NET 页面方法，作为在页面模型中公开`Server.Transfer("path")`。The first is an ASP.NET page that uses the method, exposed in the page model as `Server.Transfer("path")`. 第二部分是目标页上，它使用属性来获取第一页的标题。The second part is the target page, which uses the property to get the title of the first page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义异步任务使用类。Define an asynchronous task using the class. 定义任务时，使用方法以向页注册任务。When the task is defined, use the method to register the task with the page. 注册任务之后, 调用方法开始异步任务。After registering the task, invoke the method to begin the asynchronous task. 方法可用于同步和异步页面。The method can be used with both synchronous and asynchronous pages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将具有属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property with the and methods. 请注意，开始、 结束和超时处理程序的使用。Note the use of beginning, ending, and time-out handlers. 在示例中，人为延迟引入以演示超出分配的时间内的形式中指定的任务的异步任务的这种情况属性。In the example, an artificial delay is introduced to demonstrate the situation of an asynchronous task exceeding the allotted time for the task as specified in the property. 在实际方案中，一个异步任务无法用于执行数据库调用或映像生成，例如，和超时处理程序提供妥善降级，如果在指定的时间内未执行该任务。In a real-world scenario, an asynchronous task could be used to perform database calls or image generation, for example, and the time-out handler provides graceful degradation if the task is not performed in a specified amount of time. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果页面正在通过 ASP.NET 路由发出的请求的响应中，此属性提供对作为路由数据传递 URL 参数值的访问。If a page is running in response to a request made through ASP.NET routing, this property provides access to the URL parameter values that were passed as route data. 如果该页面运行以响应而不是路由 URL 的物理 URL，此属性是`null`。If the page runs in response to a physical URL instead of a route URL, this property is `null`. 下面的示例演示如何提取名为 URL 参数的值`year`。The following example shows how to extract the value of a URL parameter that is named `year`. ```vb Dim year As Integer = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values("year")) ``` ```csharp int year = Convert.ToInt32(Page.RouteData.Values["year"]) ``` 如果使用的 URL 模式定义路由`{locale}/{year}`域`contoso.com`，以及所请求的 URL 是否`contoso.com/US/2010`，`year`将包含值"2010"当此代码运行。If the route is defined by using the URL pattern `{locale}/{year}` for the domain `contoso.com`, and if the requested URL is `contoso.com/US/2010`, `year` will contain the value "2010" when this code runs. 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 路由](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a)。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/892441af-8f1d-483e-ab5f-b82c23576f5a).

ASP.NET 包括的两个子类类，将状态信息保存在 ASP.NET 页中包含的隐藏字段的类和中保存状态的类与关联的对象请求。ASP.NET includes two descendents of the class, the class that saves state information in a hidden field included in the ASP.NET page, and the class that saves state in the object associated with the request. 请注意，当使用类隐藏的视图状态字段仍的呈现将如这用于确定回发。Note that when using the class the hidden VIEWSTATE field is still rendered as this is used to determine post back. 若要将状态保存在所选的位置，您应创建一个新的子代类，该类将保存并加载到持久性介质中的所选的状态。To save state in the location of your choice, you should create a new descendent of the class that saves and loads state to the persistence medium of your choice. 有关创建一个新的示例对象，请参阅类。For an example of creating a new object, see the class. 如果您使用的.NET Framework 版本 1.0 或 1.1，重写此方法，如果你想要保存中隐藏字段以外的任何状态。If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, override this method if you want to save the state in anything other than a hidden field. 如果你选择这样做，还必须重写方法。If you choose to do so, you must also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供有关当前请求的会话的信息。This property provides information about the current request's session. 一个`Session`对象保留的每个用户都将从 ASP.NET 应用程序请求的页或文档。A `Session` object is maintained for each user that requests a page or document from an ASP.NET application. 变量存储在`Session`对象不会被丢弃，当用户在应用程序中移动的页面; 相反，这些变量将保存，只要用户访问你的应用程序中的页。Variables stored in the `Session` object are not discarded when the user moves from page to page in the application; instead, these variables persist as long as the user is accessing pages in your application. 有关会话状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 会话状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For more information about session state, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建`GetStyle`函数，用于检索存储在 Web 窗体页的会话状态中的密钥并将其值转换为字符串。The following code example creates a `GetStyle` function that retrieves a key stored in the session state of the Web Forms page and converts its value to a string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下，不要在代码中设置此属性。In most circumstances, do not set this property in code. 设置`SmartNavigation`属性为`true`.aspx 文件中的指令中。Set the `SmartNavigation` attribute to `true` in the directive in the .aspx file. 当请求页面时，动态生成的类设置此属性。When the page is requested, the dynamically generated class sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 2.0 版中，属性已弃用。In ASP.NET version 2.0, the property is deprecated. 使用方法和属性改为。Use the method and the property instead. 通过 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 浏览器中或更高版本、 智能导航请求页面时，通过执行以下，增强了页面的用户的体验：When a page is requested by Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 browser, or later, smart navigation enhances the user's experience of the page by performing the following: - 消除导致导航的闪烁。Eliminating the flash caused by navigation. - 移动到页面时，持久保存的滚动位置。Persisting the scroll position when moving from page to page. - 保留元素焦点之间导航。Persisting element focus between navigations. - 保留页状态在浏览器的历史记录中仅最后一个。Retaining only the last page state in the browser's history. 与需要频繁的回发的 ASP.NET 页面，但并不返回显著改变的可视化内容，最好使用智能导航。Smart navigation is best used with ASP.NET pages that require frequent postbacks but with visual content that does not change dramatically on return. 确定是否要将此属性设置为时，请仔细考虑这一点`true`。Consider this carefully when deciding whether to set this property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不是指直接级联样式表 (CSS)。This property does not refer directly to a cascading style sheet (CSS). 属性包含 ASP.NET 主题，其中可以包括在其中的 CSS 文件的名称。The property contains the name of an ASP.NET theme, which can include CSS files within it. 属性指定在页生命周期早期适用于页面的主题的名称，而属性指定的页生命周期中更高版本应用于页面的主题名称。The property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page early in the page life cycle, whereas the property specifies the name of a theme that is applied to a page later in the page life cycle. 这意味着，在页上的设置优先样式表主题中的设置。This means that settings on the page take precedence over settings in the style sheet theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 在页面指令中或通过重写该属性，通常可以设置此属性的值。You typically set a value for this property in the page directive or by overriding the property. 有关信息，请参阅以下主题：For information, see the following topics: - [如何： 将 ASP.NET 主题更改How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9d72364-4d77-4b73-84be-7630dc63e0fe) - [如何： 以编程方式应用 ASP.NET 主题](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))[How to: Apply ASP.NET Themes Programmatically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/02eed7c3-01e8-4e20-8358-df47dbd4f148))

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪跟踪，并提供了有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。Tracing tracks and presents the execution details about a Web request. 对于要在呈现的页面中显示的跟踪数据，必须启用页面或应用程序级别的跟踪。For trace data to be visible in a rendered page, you must enable tracing at the page or application level. 默认情况下禁用页面上的跟踪。Tracing on a page is disabled by default. 若要启用页跟踪，使用指令`<% @ Page trace="true" %>`。To enable tracing for a page, use the directive `<% @ Page trace="true" %>`. 若要启用对整个应用程序的跟踪，必须在应用程序的配置文件中，Web.config 文件中，将驻留的应用程序的根目录中启用它。To enable tracing for an entire application, you must enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性和方法通过属性。The following code example demonstrates accessing the property and the method through the property. 此代码将调用方法仅在跟踪过程中启用的对象。This code calls the method only when tracing is enabled for the object. 如果未启用，此代码将不运行，这有助于减少你的应用程序的开销。If it is not enabled, this code will not run, which can help reduce overhead for your application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法，当用户单击具有任何 ASP.NET 服务器控件`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`，这是默认设置。This method is invoked when a user clicks any ASP.NET server control that has the `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, which is the default. 其中包括， ，并Web 服务器控件， ，并HTML 服务器控件和控件可以自动回发到服务器，如， ， ，并控件。These include the , , and Web server controls, the , , and HTML server controls, and controls that can automatically post back to the server such as the , , , and controls. 若要禁用验证的任何按钮控件的页上，设置按钮控件`CausesValidation`属性设置为`false`。To disable validation for any button control on the page, set the button control's `CausesValidation` property to `false`. 调用此方法时，它将循环中包含的验证控件对象与关联属性并调用当前的验证组中的每个验证控件的验证逻辑。When this method is invoked, it iterates through the validation controls contained in the object associated with the property and invokes the validation logic for each validation control in the current validation group. 验证组取决于发布到服务器的页的控件。The validation group is determined by the control that posted the page to the server. 如果未验证指定组，则使用没有验证组。If no validation group is specified, then no validation group is used. > [!NOTE] > 页验证的行为已更改。The behavior of page validation has changed. 在[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]，不能再控制呼叫方法; 它们使用方法相反。In [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], controls no longer call the method; they use the method instead. 如果您使用方法[!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)]页上，验证组将被忽略，并且所有控件进行都验证。If you use the method on an [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)] page, validation groups are ignored and all controls are validated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用定义了几个不同的验证组的方案中的页上的方法。The following code example calls the method on a page in a scenario with several different validation groups defined. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## Remarks 控件所需的内侧`
`标记可以调用此方法之前它们呈现，以便是否它们位于外部标记显示错误消息。Controls that are required to be inside `` tags can call this method before they render so that an error message is shown if they are placed outside the tags. 回发时或依赖于已注册的脚本块的控件应调用此方法中的重写方法。Controls that post back or depend on registered script blocks should call this method in an override of the method. 具有不同的方式呈现服务器窗体元素的页的可重写此方法引发异常不同条件下。Pages that have a different way of rendering the server form element can override this method to throw an exception under different conditions. 如果没有包含在服务器控件的回发时或使用客户端的脚本将不起服务器控件 (<`form runat="server">`) 标记。Server controls that post back or use client-side script will not work if they are not enclosed in the server control (<`form runat="server">`) tags. 在呈现时没有包含在提供明确的错误消息时，这些控件可以调用此方法控件。These controls can call this method when they render to provide a clear error message when they are not enclosed in the control. 开发自定义服务器控件时，通常会调用此方法重写时`Render`任何类型的输入标记的方法。When you develop a custom server control, it is common to call this method when you override the `Render` method for any kind of input tag. 这一点特别重要，如果输入的控件调用，或如果发出客户端脚本。This is particularly important if the input control calls , or if it emits client script. 复合服务器控件不需要进行此调用。A composite server control does not need to make this call. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重写自定义服务器控件的方法。The following code example overrides the method of a custom server control. 当此控件将其内容写入到一个页面时，它使用方法以确保开始和结束标记之间显示该控件控件。When this control writes its content to a page, it uses the method to make sure that the control appears between the opening and closing tags of an control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性可以帮助您防止对你的应用程序免受恶意用户的攻击。Setting the property can help you prevent attacks on your application from malicious users. 之所以如此是因为您可以将标识符分配给单个用户的视图状态变量，以便它们不能使用变量来生成一种攻击。It does this by allowing you to assign an identifier to the view-state variable for individual users so that they cannot use the variable to generate an attack. 有关 Web 攻击，以帮助防止它们可以执行的操作的详细信息，请参阅[充分利用 ASP.NET 内置功能受到保护，这一点 Web 攻击](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557)。For more information about Web attacks and about what you can do to help prevent them, see [Take Advantage of ASP.NET Built-in Features to Fend Off Web Attacks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163557). 可以将此属性设置为任何字符串值，如对用户的身份验证名称或值。You can set this property to any string value, such as the user's authenticated name or the value. > [!NOTE] > 您必须将此属性设置期间`Page_Init`页处理阶段。You must set this property during the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 设置此属性在`Page_Load`阶段将引发异常。Setting this property during the `Page_Load` phase throws an exception.

exception.span: 在页处理期间，对 属性的访问太迟。

span.span: The property was accessed too late during page processing.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性设置为`false`隐藏页面的呈现的内容。The following example sets the property to `false` to hide the rendered content of a page. 第一次请求此页时，数据源填充，并在页中显示。When this page is first requested, a data source is populated and displayed in the page. 当用户单击按钮，`HideButton_Click`事件处理程序将隐藏的全部呈现页的内容。When a user clicks the button, the `HideButton_Click` event handler hides the entire rendered content of the page.
